creator: johnson@soho.club.tw
text:
I'm try to add a zh_TW language page.
I've add the zh_TW tag in publication.xconf.
when I add a new document,the system always say ****_zh not found.
when I add a new document with ****_zh, the system do not alow the word"_"
how to do with zh_TW

Lenya just support two letters language code like en,de.
but it's not enough,the chinese has two language codes zh_TW , zh_CN
and that's the i18n standard.
pls extend it to 5 letters,so we can add zh_TW code language pages.
creator: johnson@soho.club.tw

text:
according to RFC 3066 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3066.txt this should be zh-tw
not zh_TW. i'll change the code to allow for this
creator: gregor@apache.org
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
(In reply to comment #3)
> according to RFC 3066 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3066.txt this should be zh-tw
> not zh_TW. i'll change the code to allow for this

Yes, a dash should be used and not an underscore but the country code should be
in capitals: zh-TW
